description: There is nothing like having a good neighbor and by that I mean a neighbor who will take care of any sexual needs that might cum along. Lucky for Jay and Ryan they have been close friends as well as neighbors for over 3 years and they have been tempted to fool around but never did until now. When they first met they both had lots of sexual tension but no release was in sight until we brought them together for an explosive neighborly CJB session. You can see the wonderment in their faces and the hesitation of what might come to be after and I'm sure once they leave our soft couch these two hotties will continue to fuck once back home. Cum check them blow, fuck, kiss, lick and see the friendly neighbors they truly are. Enjoy!
title: Neighborly Friendly
